title: Indian-style yellow coconut curry chicken
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '3 tablespoons curry powder', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 bay leaf', '1/2 teaspoon grated fresh root ginger', '1/2 teaspoon caster sugar', '1/4 teaspoon salt or to taste', '2 skinless chicken breast fillets, cut into bite-size pieces', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '250ml natural yoghurt', '175ml coconut milk', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper']
